description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Just for kids...an easy to play game with narration, so your children can have fun playing on their own.  Easy to follow directions for one or two players.  A game that will sure to be played over and over again as they race around the board to get their bunny to the carrot patch first!
